Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-6387 affecting package openssh for versions less than 8.9p1-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-6387 affecting package openssh for versions less than 8.9p1-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openssh is earlier than 8.9p1-6, affected by CVE-2024-6387
